commentBody: My mother was four years old and living within blocks of the West Side Grounds in Chicago when the Cubs won their last World Series.  You can forget the Billy Goat Curse all other supposed "curses".  The real curse occurred when new owners moved the Cubs from their West Side home to what became Wrigley Field on the North Side.  It is unlikely the Cubs will ever win a World Series until they return to their true home on the West Side of the city.
